akn:section.akn:heading: Proceedings in more than one state.

akn:content.akn:p: If the Superior Court has jurisdiction under ยง 21-2402.03, it may proceed with the case unless a court in another state acquires jurisdiction under provisions similar to ยง 21-2402.03 before the appointment or issuance of the order.

If the Superior Court does not have jurisdiction under ยง 21-2402.03, whether at the time the petition is filed or at any time before the appointment or issuance of the order, the Superior Court shall stay the proceeding and communicate with the court in the other state. If the court in the other state has jurisdiction, the Superior Court shall dismiss the petition unless the court in the other state determines that the Superior Court is a more appropriate forum.
